data.description:
FIGHT with any weapon you can find against different enemies in the Hex7 Arenas. 
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031640_1611492052972544_8434024045580790583_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=IEkhnNKHx64Q7kNvgEANpCe&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYA0S8uC3jx-O7S7ChJNzO5hB5v6gIUrW_GZpv9f5Uj_lQ&oe=6652F8CC)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game as much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035393_1502492917145105_2500292279720560247_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=KEkCGNEQa58Q7kNvgFFtBdJ&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBF0UzWzzqZvE0nWTcoc3qIOgY6uno-8ebM_UrCiwlDpg&oe=66532F1F)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035339_749541023684513_3682281630778817377_n.png?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=FC0wjNdIfa8Q7kNvgFIPav1&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBdrogd3Jo76_g-J55sm60XrVY0ADQWVq-NxA_YWgzuNw&oe=66532DA4)
